price: 40. Así podremos seguir a los brujos si resultan ellos los vencedores”.
arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: laʿallanā nattabiʿu al-saḥarata in kānū humu al-ghālibīna
